title: Opening Night
lyrics:
Tell me how our love grows
When you're tryna dig for lies
You're just being emotional, mm
When I'm being logical at times
Hate when you're irrational
When I see you chronically online
Why bring this up right now?
You know it's my opening night
Circulation gone, shaking on the floor
Steroids in my lungs, fighting off the mud
Give me what I want, then we'll start the show
I'm fixing (I'm fixing)
I'm fixing (I'm fixing)
Oh
